metadata.title: CVE-2015-8806 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
dict.c in libxml2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(heap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via an unexpectedcharacter immediately after the "<!DOCTYPE html" substring in a craftedHTML document.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8806` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1
libxml2-utils - 2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1
python-libxml2 - 2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1').
